page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LUCY.
page.content: On Saturday mornings my digital alarm wakes me up at 8 o'clock am I manage to tumble out of bed and get dressed. I walk downstairs and eat some toast or cereal and then clean my teeth.My Grandad usually visits at about 9 o'clock in time to take me to The Southampton Junior Orchestra and my Mum and Sister into town.At orchestra I play the flute and we play music by Handel and Mozart .I stay at orchestra for two and a quarter hours and at quarter to twelve we all drive home . My Grandads car is a Lada Saloon and it seems quite small in comparison with my Dads Austin Princess. When we get home we have a cup of tea and then my Dad comes home from playing golf at Bramshaw.My Grandad then goes home and then we have lunch. For lunch we have a snack like crackers and cheese or beans on toast.
